backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report stub containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Project README describing features, image replacement, and certificate-adding instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthContext: Authentication context managing main user state using Internet Identity and localStorage.
frontend/src/components/certificates/Cer: Grid gallery showing certificate thumbnails or PDF placeholders with reveal animations.
Modal displaying certificate details with image or embedded PDF viewer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Global layout with background texture, navigation, content outlet, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/components/media/ProfilePho: Displays uploaded profile photo or fallback image with decorative effects.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: Wrapper adding scroll-based reveal animations with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Navigation bar component with links, user authentication actions, and edit options for the main user.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/modal: Modal for editing About page text fields including title, subtitle, bio, and additional info.
Modal for adding or editing certificates with file upload, validation, and delete support.
Displays a modal listing uploaded certificates, allowing selection for editing or adding a new certificate with previews for images or PDFs.
Modal for editing the certificates page title and subtitle with simple form inputs and save/cancel handling.
Provides a modal to edit contact page headings and call‑to‑action text, syncing state with initial content on open.
Manages a modal for adding, editing, and removing work experience entries and achievements in a dynamic list.
Modal for customizing homepage hero content including headline, tagline, and description.
Simple modal to update the user's displayed name using the uploads context.
Modal for editing full personal details such as name, headline, bio, contact info, and location with save/cancel behavior.
Modal for creating, editing, and removing project entries, updating fields and saving filtered valid projects.
Modal to edit the title and subtitle for the projects page with save and cancel handling.
Modal that lets the user update the site's navigation title with reset and save actions.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Controls onboarding and welcome flow, displaying onboarding screens or the main site layout based on user state.
Main onboarding interface allowing users to upload profile data, certificates, and edit multiple content sections using various modals.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Uploa: Context provider managing all onboarding data, updates, persistence, and site title syncing.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/uploa: Defines onboarding-related data interfaces and handles loading, saving, clearing, and converting files for localStorage.
Three.js scene rendering a rotating distorted sphere with optional reduced motion settings.
frontend/src/components/three/SecondaryS: Three.js scene with animated floating boxes that rotate and oscillate unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/components/three/ThreeCanva: Wrapper component providing a configured Three.js Canvas for child 3D elements.
frontend/src/components/welcome/WelcomeS: Welcome screen showing the logged-in user's name with options to edit it or continue onboarding.
frontend/src/data/certificates.ts: Static list of sample certificate metadata with IDs, titles, issuers, dates, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, updating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file intended for future React Query hooks; exports nothing.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmoothScroll.ts: Hook that toggles smooth scrolling based on the user's reduced‑motion preference.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, base styles, and reduced-motion overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders App wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page using uploaded content or defaults, including bio, skills, and visual components.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Displays a certificates gallery using uploaded or static data with modal viewing support.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information and social links using uploaded data with animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Renders a timeline-style work experience page using uploaded or default experience entries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, animated text, CTA buttons, and a features section, using uploaded content when available.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Displays a projects listing with optional custom project data, dynamic animations, and a 3D scene header.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Defines shared motion and spacing design tokens for durations, easing, and layout sizes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind settings, theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and architectural notes for an editable website with admin-only Internet Identity login.
